EmailTemplate.name: Resolution survey email
EmailTemplate.subject: Customer Service Feedback for {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
How did we do? Hi {!Case.Contact}, We wanted to know how it's going since we worked with you to resolve {!Case.CaseNumber}. We've prepared a short survey that you can fill out to share your thoughts with us. Your answers will help us serve you better in the future, and it will only take a few minutes to complete the survey.
Cheers, Acceldata Support Team,
